name: PlanetApeClub
description: PlanetApeClub is a combination of GameFi & Casino project. We provide fun and earning opportunities for our users through building crypto casinos & play-to-earn games. Unlike the traditional play-to-earn games, PlanetApeClub uses a deflationary token for every game the project will deploy. Our flagship betting game apecrash.io is now live which will act as the first burning mechanism of $PLAC, all in house profits will be burnt making $PLAC token extremely deflationary. Our NFTs for ApeWars is already designed and ready at planetapeclub.io/mint to make sure that we are one step closer to our Game ''ApeWars''
